performance_benchmark

Performance Benchmark for Coulomb Calculations

This script demonstrates the performance improvements achieved through JIT compilation and other optimizations. It compares the original implementation with the JIT-accelerated version across different system sizes.

Author: AI Assistant Date: 2024

Functions

create_test_system(N)

Create a test quantum wire system with given grid size.

benchmark_initialization(N[, num_runs])

Benchmark solver initialization.

benchmark_potential_calculation(N[, num_runs])

Benchmark screened potential calculations.

benchmark_collision_rates(N[, num_runs])

Benchmark collision rate calculations.

run_comprehensive_benchmark()

Run comprehensive performance benchmark.

create_performance_plots(results)

Create performance comparison plots.

analyze_scaling(results)

Analyze the scaling behavior of the algorithms.

memory_usage_analysis()

Analyze memory usage for different grid sizes.

main()

Main benchmark function.
